title: Flipper
brief_description: Flipper the movie and subsequent television series alerted the world to the incredible intelligence of Dolphins. Chuck Connors plays Porter Ricks, a fisherman who does not value the dolphins in his fishing territory. His son Sandy develops a rapport with Flipper, a wounded dolphin, but finds himself in conflict with his father. Only when Flipper intervenes in a life-threatening situation can Porter appreciate the wonderful dolphin. Beautifully filmed, “Flipper” is a classic family fare.
